name: Little Miss Dress-  PDF pattern
description:
Little Miss Dress—This darling dress has a lined bodice, puffed sleeves, and a gathered skirt.

Size: 2t (I've heard feedback that it runs a little small)


+11 page PDF file with full size pattern pieces for the bodice and sleeves-- instructions for cutting the skirt.
+ Beautiful pictures with step-by-step instructions 
+prints on 8.5" x 11" paper 
+File is emailed to your paypal email address within 24 hours (usually it's a lot sooner, within 30 minutes)

Read more about the dress here: http://freshlycompleted.blogspot.com/2013/04/little-miss-dress-free-size-2-pdf.html

name: My First Scripture Bag PDF sewing pattern
description:
My first scripture bag—a darling bag sewn with love, made to fit one Book of Mormon.  Pattern includes: felt padding for a soft bag, a small perfect-fit handle, and all finished seams. 

+19 page PDF file with full size pattern pieces 
+ Clear pictures with step-by-step instructions 
+Prints on 8.5" x 11" paper
+File is emailed to your paypal email address within 24 hours (usually it's much sooner, like 30 minutes.)

For more pictures please visit: http://freshlycompleted.blogspot.com/2013/11/my-first-scripture-bag-pdf-pattern-for.html

name: A Gentleman's Bow Tie PDF sewing pattern
description:
A Gentleman’s Bow Tie—the perfect bow tie for gentlemen of all ages.  This truly is a gentleman's bow tie, with a looped bow and a double layer in the back.  Made with easy on/off velcro in the back.

Pattern includes: three different sizes, machine and hand sewn stitching, and a quality product with all finished seams. 

Sizes: S (0-12 months) , M (12m to 4t), L (5 to adult)+ instructions to customize the neck strap to fit any size. 

+14 page PDF file with full size pattern pieces 
+ Beautiful pictures with step-by-step instructions 
+prints on 8.5" x 11" paper
+File is emailed to your paypal email address within 24 hours (usually it's a lot sooner, within 30 minutes).
